title: Game bug
body: Hi riot ^^ i'm just a summoner who notice that when i spawn at the top side of the map (me and my team) , all the turrets got the good colors except the inib turrets they are red instead of blue and the inib enemy turret are blue instead of red. ty bye :D

>
